name: Skrolls of Thermos
description:
Theo is required to traverse the land in search of the Skrolls of Thermos

A twin-stick or mouse+keyboard roguelike game made in 72h for the Godot Community Game Jam

Credits: Securas: Design, Programming, Art, Music and SFX: 

Zon The Daddy Dev: Design and Playtesting

Raindrinker: Design and Playtesting
